projects.title: Mechanical Assignment Portal
projects.description: A Flask web application designed for mechanical engineering students to submit assignment answers for manufacturing processes questionnaire. Features secure authentication, unique answer validation, and comprehensive student management.

projects.title: Prescription Management System
projects.description: A comprehensive C-based prescription management system for healthcare providers. Features patient management, prescription tracking, and medical record maintenance with efficient data structures and algorithms.

projects.title: Farmer Platform
projects.description: A comprehensive platform designed to connect farmers with modern agricultural solutions, market access, and essential farming resources. Built to bridge the gap between traditional farming and technology.

projects.title: Hugging Face ML Model Deployment
projects.description: Deployed machine learning models on Hugging Face Hub with comprehensive model cards and inference APIs. Featured models and datasets for computer vision and NLP tasks.

projects.title: ZenML MLOps Pipeline
projects.description: Built end-to-end MLOps pipelines using ZenML for automated model training, evaluation, and deployment. Implemented CI/CD for machine learning workflows.

projects.title: ML_IITM Course Repository
projects.description: Comprehensive collection of machine learning implementations and assignments from IIT Madras coursework. Covers supervised and unsupervised learning algorithms.
